titleStmt.title: Iero-metropolis, or, The holy, the great, the beloved new Jerusalem shortly to come down from God out of heaven : being the work of Gods own hands ... / by William Sherwin ...
titleStmt.author: Sherwin, William, 1607-1687?

notesStmt.note: First word of title in Greek character.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
